forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning with clearing during the afternoon hours as drier air moves in on gusty breezes. High 9C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning with mainly sunny skies during the afternoon hours as drier air moves in on gusty breezes. High 49F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low 3C. Winds N at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Gusty winds during the evening. Low 38F. Winds N at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Wind increasing. A few clouds from time to time. High 11C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Wind increasing. A few clouds from time to time. High 53F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 38F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 45F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 48F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 54F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
